trans-unit.source: Represents a secure client session for user activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个用于用户激活、 许可证绑定和其他权限管理操作的安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, SecureEnvironment is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: 与其他<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>类型，SecureEnvironment 是仅可用于完全信任应用程序。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the ApplicationManifest specified when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取 ApplicationManifest 时指定<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>已创建。

trans-unit.source: The application manifest specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*> method when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> is created.
trans-unit.target: 指定到的应用程序清单<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>方法时<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>创建。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session for a specified user with a given rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的权限清单创建指定的用户的安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: This Create method is intended for use with users that are already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此创建方法旨在用于已激活的用户，例如从<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>返回列表中提供

trans-unit.source: Use the alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method for users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: 使用备用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>尚未激活的用户的方法。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序权限清单。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 用户或用户组以授予对权限管理内容访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 用于激活、 许可证绑定和其他权限管理操作的安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session given an application rights manifest, <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建给定应用程序权限清单，客户端安全会话<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This Create method is intended for new users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: 此创建方法适用于尚未激活的新用户。

trans-unit.source: Activating a new user includes a roundtrip server transaction to obtain the User Certificate and Client License Certificate.
trans-unit.target: 激活新用户包括往返服务器事务获取用户证书和客户端许可证证书。

trans-unit.source: The alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method can be used if a user is already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>可以使用方法，如果已激活用户，例如从<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>返回列表中提供</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>的备用

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序权限清单。

trans-unit.source: The method of authentication.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证的方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the user rights account certificate.
trans-unit.target: 用户权限帐户证书的类型。

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 用于激活、 许可证绑定和其他权限管理操作的安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用的所有资源<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The application should call Dispose when finished with the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应调用释放时已完成，但<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: After Dispose is called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> are reclaimed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 后，资源分配给<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>垃圾回收器回收。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before the last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> is released.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用在最后一个引用之前释放<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>发布。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the instance's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果未调用 Dispose，资源分配给<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>直到垃圾回收器调用的实例不会被释放<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>调用与受保护的 Dispose 方法`disposing`参数设置为`true`。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>引用。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the activated users.
trans-unit.target: 返回激活用户的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of the currently activated users.
trans-unit.target: 当前活动的用户的列表。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a given user has been activated for accessing rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 指示给定的用户是否已激活访问权限管理的内容。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 用户或用户组以授予对权限管理内容访问权限。

trans-unit.source: if the given user has been activated for accessing rights managed content; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 user 内容; 否则为访问权限管理已激活 。

trans-unit.source: Removes the license activation for a specified user.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定用户的许可证激活。

trans-unit.source: The user authentication must be performed either with Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 身份验证或 Passport 身份验证，则必须执行用户身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The user to remove the license activation for.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的许可证激活的用户。

trans-unit.source: The user parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The user parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The given user is not authenticated with either Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: 给定 user 未经过 Windows 身份验证或 Passport 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user or user-group specified when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户组时，指定<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>已创建。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*> method when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: 用户组指定<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>方法时<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>已创建。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>
